CustomField.formula: Case_Management__r.Office__r.Address_1__c + "," + " " + IF( ISBLANK(Case_Management__r.Office__r.Address_2__c), "" , " " + Case_Management__r.Office__r.Address_2__c + ", ") + Case_Management__r.Office__r.City__c + "," + " " + Case_Management__r.Office__r.State__c + " " + Case_Management__r.Office__r.Zip_Code__c
CustomField.label: Office Address - Conga
